name: Magnetogether
description:
A game made in 6 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.

All game programming and design was done by myself solo, along with all audio and music. All of the animated graphical assets were also made by myself, but I did use Kenney's 1 Bit Pack to provide the tileset for a quick start.

Credits: 1 Bit Pack by Kenney. https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Construct 3 Shaders Used:

Massive Glitch by Mikal.

Better Outline by Skymen.

Controls:

Left Click to select a Magnet:
Right click with a Magnet selected to Activate it.
WSAD/ARROWS to move Active Magnet on the Rails.
Bring the objective to the exit portal to win.
Adjust your magnet's power with the Magnet Power Button.
Stop time with space or the UI Button. This does not stop you from moving the magnets, and can be used to set up multi stage solutions.
Open locked doors with keys to pass through them.
Beware of Glitches, they are the Enemy
R to restart level if you get stuck. Escape to return to Main Menu.
